name: Kantara
description: It involves culture of Kambla and Bhootha Kola. A human and nature conflict where Shiva is the rebellion who works against nature. A loop leads to war between villagers and evil forces. Will he able to replace peace in the village?

name: Ramayana: The Legend of Prince Rama
description: An anime adaptation of the Hindu epic the Ramayana, where Lord Ram combats the wicked king Ravana.

name: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
description: Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

name: Anbe Sivam
description: Two men, one young and arrogant, the other damaged - physically but not spiritually - by life, are thrown together by circumstances, and find that they are in some ways bound together by fate.

name: Nayakan
description: A common man's struggles against a corrupt police force put him on the wrong side of the law. He becomes a don, who is loved and respected by many, but his growing power and influence exact a heavy toll.

name: Golmaal
description: A man's simple lie to secure his job escalates into more complex lies when his orthodox boss gets suspicious.

name: Jai Bhim
description: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

name: 777 Charlie
description: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

name: Pariyerum Perumal
description: A law student from a lower caste begins a friendship with his classmate, a girl who belongs to a higher caste, and the men in her family start giving him trouble over this.

name: Manichitrathazhu
description: When a forbidden room in an old bungalow is unbolted, the spirit of a vengeful dancer is unleashed.
